sentences.sContent: The name Anastasia is derived from a Greek word meaning "of the resurrection."
sentences.sCn: 阿纳斯塔西娅这个名字是从一个意为“复活”的希腊词语衍生而来的。

sentences.sContent: ...as poorer people derive a much higher proportion of their income directly from the natural resources around them...

remMethod.val: de ＋ rive(r) → 黄河是中华文明的发源地 → 起源

words.tran: 得到；推断（derive的过去分词）；由…而来

trans.tranOther: If you say that something such as a word or feeling derives or is derived from something else, you mean that it comes from that thing

trans.tranCn: 取得，得到；追溯…的起源或来由
trans.tranOther: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
